# Extensions {background-color='{{< brand color pink >}}' background-image='../../img/background-hex-shapes.svg' background-opacity='0.5'}

## Extensions

Quarto has [extensions](https://quarto.org/docs/extensions/) that let you add custom…

- shortcodes
- filters
- document formats and templates
- brands

## Shortcode extensions {.smaller}

**Font Awesome icons** ([site](https://fontawesome.com/) + [extension](https://github.com/quarto-ext/fontawesome))

```{.bash filename="Terminal" code-line-numbers="false"}
quarto add quarto-ext/fontawesome
```

\ 

| Text | Output |
|:-----|:------:|
| `{{{< fa home >}}}` | {{< fa home >}} |
| `{{{< fa wand-magic-sparkles >}}}` | {{< fa wand-magic-sparkles >}} |
| `{{{< fa brands apple >}}}` | {{< fa brands apple >}} |
| `{{{< fa brands r-project >}}}` | {{< fa brands r-project >}} |
| `{{{< fa globe >}}}` | {{< fa globe >}} |

: {tbl-colwidths="[75,25]"}

##

Use in YAML: 

````{.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="false"}
website:
  navbar:
    left:
      - text: "{{{< fa person-chalkboard >}}} Teaching"
        href: teaching.qmd
      - text: "{{{< fa flask >}}} Research"
        href: research.qmd
    right:
      - text: "{{{< fa brands google-scholar >}}}"
        href: "https://example.com"
````

## Filter extensions

**Preview Color** ([extension](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-preview-colour))

```{.bash filename="Terminal" code-line-numbers="false"}
quarto add mcanouil/quarto-preview-colour
```

Enable in YAML, either for one page or site-wide:

````{.yaml code-line-numbers="false"}
filters:
  - preview-colour
````

## Lots of others! {.smaller}

There are hundreds of extensions: find them all at [Quarto.org \> Extensions](https://quarto.org/docs/extensions/) or at [the Quarto Extensions directory](https://m.canouil.dev/quarto-extensions/).

Here are some common extensions for websites specifically:

| Extension | Description |
|--------------------------|----------------------------------------------|
| [Font Awesome](https://github.com/quarto-ext/fontawesome) | Include [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/) icons |
| [Academicons](https://github.com/schochastics/academicons) | Include [academicons](https://jpswalsh.github.io/academicons/) icons |
| [Custom Callouts](https://quarto.thecoatlessprofessor.com/custom-callout/) | Go beyond Quarto's default `note`, `warning`, `important`, `tip`, and `caution` callouts |
| [Preview Color](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-preview-colour) | Add little circles to show hex colors |
| [Embed PDFs](https://github.com/jmgirard/embedpdf) | Easily embed PDF files in HTML documents |
| [Downloadthis](https://github.com/shafayetShafee/downloadthis) | Create download buttons |

: {tbl-colwidths="[30,70]"}
